replies.body: @tigor101 I got this   asking like 5 months ago and still love it :) I have seen nobody have the exact same skin, and the best reason of all is because its a rainbow derp!

replies.body:
@steven5703 How i got my name is actually kind of a long story, My brothers username is edoggy4 and my sisters is Mkitty5, mine was supposed to be ebirdy6 but i didnt know at the time so I went with my age witch was 9 atm, But how you got it was the first letter of your first name and then your favorite animal or one that just fits, My favorite animal is birds.When the name change option comes out i will change my name to Ebirdy.

@NuclarDucky +3s 1 @&n :D

@HeroBrine683752 Yea! But honestly all those letters :D

@Evocal My favorite nebula map is Quintus And sentex, favorite food is spaghetti, and favorite color is blue
